summary: A configuration container for the TrOCR causal language model that holds all architectural hyperparameters—vocabulary size, model dimension, decoder depth, attention heads, feed‑forward size, activation function, positional embedding strategy, dropout settings, initialization scale, layer‑drop, caching and scaling options—enabling consistent model instantiation.
business_intent: Provides a structured way to define and reproduce the exact TrOCR model architecture for training, fine‑tuning, and deployment in handwritten text recognition applications.
